titleStmt.title: Britannia triumphans a masque, presented at White Hall, by the Kings Majestie and his lords, on the Sunday after Twelfth-night, 1637. By Inigo Iones surveyor of his Majesties workes, and William Davenant her Majesties servant.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Inigo, 1573-1652.
D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the flying Horse neere Yorke house,

notesStmt.note: The years on the title page are given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the flying Horse neere Yorke house
